content.rendered:
The Office for Students (OfS), the new regulator designed to champion the interests of students, promote choice and help to ensure that students are receiving a good deal for their investment in higher education, has legally come into force since (1 January 2018).
Regent College London are currently regulated, and progressing through the OfS registration process
